term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - freely rotating chain in polymers
term.title: freely rotating chain

item.text: A hypothetical linear chain molecule, free from short-range and long-range interactions, consisting of infinitely thin rectilinear segments (bonds) of fixed length, jointed at fixed bond angles; the torsion angles of the bonds can assume all values with equal probability.
